Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.aksenova.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.aksenova.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements Impler, JarImpler
This class generates implementations for Java interfaces. It provides functionality to generate Java source files, compile them, and package compiled classes into JAR files.

The class implements the Impler and JarImpler interfaces. It generates implementations for interfaces by creating a new class with method stubs that return default values.

      simpleName - The simple name of the original interface.
      format - The file format (e.g., ".java" or ".class").

      The path where the implementation file should be created.

      Parameters:
      token - The class to be implemented.
      jarFile - The path where the JAR file should be created.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if an error occurs while creating the JAR file.

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The entry point of the program.

      This method processes command-line arguments and either generates a Java source file implementing the given interface or creates a JAR file containing the compiled implementation.

      Expected usage:

      • java Implementor full.class.name - Generates an implementation source file.
      • java Implementor -jar full.class.name output.jar - Generates a compiled implementation and packages it into a JAR.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line arguments. It must be either:
      • A single argument specifying the fully qualified name of the interface to implement.
      • Three arguments: -jar, the fully qualified name of the interface, and the output JAR file path.
